ЁЯСС
Founder of the Rai Dynasty

Founded the Rai Dynasty of Sindh. It was a Buddhist dynasty that made Sindh a powerful state.

ЁЯП░
Capital and Administration

Capital: Aror (Aror/Alor).
He divided his empire into four provinces and appointed a governor for each.

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Source: 'Chachnama' - the main Persian source for the history of Sindh.
  • Expansion: Expanded the empire from Kashmir in the east, Makran in the west, Surat port in the south, and Kandahar in the north.
